articles.description: Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.
articles.content:
Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.

articles.author: Elana Spivack
articles.title: These 6-million-year-old teeth may be from Europe's last panda species - Inverse
articles.description: Fossilized teeth found in the 1970s in Bulgaria may actually be from a distinct panda species, the last one to reside in Europe.
articles.content:
In the late 1970s
 in northwestern Bulgaria, paleontologists found two obsidian-black teeth, one curved upper canine, and one upper pre-molar.

articles.title: WHO Europe expects more monkeypox-related deaths - The Jakarta Post - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: "With the continued spread of monkeypox in Europe, we will expect to see more deaths," Catherine Smallwood, Senior Emergency Officer at WHO Europe, said in a statement.
